Reviews.Title: Optio 90W
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Miller
Reviews.Content: Great bargain and prompt shipping from the sellers.  Only drawback seems to be poor battery life (or at least in my opinion).

Reviews.Title: Pentax Optio W90
Reviews.Author: mikieg250
Reviews.Content: Got this camera especially for out trip to Hawai'i, we wanted to take some pictures under water as we snorkeled, after reading several reviews decided on the Pentax. It took great pictures, only drawback that I see is the flash range, it is very hard to get real close to the fish, but 5-6 feet they turned out good. The included software does a great job on enhancing the underwater pictures. We had no problems with water intursion, and the battery lasted longer than we did each trip into the water. I would definately recommend playing with the focus settings, specifically the maual focus, finally figured it out after several tries at getting pictures of spiders. I was happy with the package from Bigvalue, had plenty of room on the memory card and the extra battery is a definate must.Under water or on land 95% of out pictures turned out great, about the same as the Kodak easy share we also use. Lacks a little quality in low light conditions, and more optical zoom would be nice, and getting used to where the power button and shoot buttons are. ( I sometimes would turn it off when  taking a picture)but over all for what this camera was designed for I really like it. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS MY 3RD
Reviews.Author: PETER
Reviews.Content: IT'S AN EXCELENT CAMARA, THIS WOULD BE MY THIRD, THE FIRST ONE A W10, WAS WITH ME FOR ABOUT 3 YEARS, IT WAS DAMAGED BECAUSE SOMEONE PUT IT IN THE WATER WITHOUT CLOSING IT PROPERLY, THIS WAS FIXED ON THE W80, WHICH I BOUGHT WITH A 25% DISCOUNT BECAUSE OF THE FIRST.  THIS ONE WAS STOLEN, SO I GOT THIS NEW ONE.  ITS GREAT, EASY TO USE AND TAKES GREAT PICS  & VIDEOS.  I ONLY BUY PENTAX.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love this camera
Reviews.Author: Carla Hampton
Reviews.Content: Purchased to take underwater photos and video during snorkeling adventures. Love shape of camera because it makes it easy to grip. Very good quality photos and easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: K. OCONNELL
Reviews.Content: I was a bit disappointed in this product, because it really did not perform as well as I had hoped.  The camera is small and compact, which is great, but the screen is so small, it is very difficult to see what you are shooting at under water.  The picture quality is good but not excellent, and all in all I wish I would have purchased a different camera ... particularly for the price.  Two of my friends had CoolPix underwater cameras, and both of them have much better photos than what I ended up with ... shooting the same subject(s).

Reviews.Title: what a deal!
Reviews.Author: crowbody
Reviews.Content: first of all this is an awesome camera. its been with me around the world several times. it needs no special case or pampering, i just clip it to my belt and let it bang around, its fine. takes nice pictures above water and beneath. the film quality is not that of say a gopro but this is a far more versatile camera. i highly recommend the camera and if you can get it with this package, even better. loved all the freebies in here, the extra battery is nice even though the batteries hold thier charge very very well. get it. you wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Bethany
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband that is in the water all of the time. He has taken it snorkeling many times, and so far it has held up very well in water and the few times that it has been dropped.

Reviews.Title: so excited about my new camera
Reviews.Author: Ty M "Bintmont"
Reviews.Content: i ordered this yesterday mornings, and its in my hands right now! you can only imagine how happy am i to have this great camera this fast! shipping was free, so that was plus plus! i actually wanted it for this upcoming weekend's caming trip, but i didnt think it would be here by then. i was not willing to pay the extra $$ to get 2 day shipping because it was too expensive: but im sooo very happy that i didnt cuz these guys regular shipping is stupendously fast!!!!!!!! granted, i am located in pa, and they ship from nj. nonetheless, i am estatic that they ship so fast! i'd def shop with Big Value again: they are great!!! i played around with the camera a lil, and so far so good, auto focus was good...i will update this review after the camping trip n let u know more about how rugged the camera does n how well it does in water.

ProductInfo.Features:
Rugged 12th-generation waterproof digital camera is adventure proof, and suitable for almost any environment
Waterproof to 33 feet; shockproof design protects from drops up to 5 feet; also crushproof, coldproof and dustproof
14-megapixel resolution; wide-angle 5x internal optical zoom lens (28-140mm equivalent)
Capture video in widescreen 720p HD at 30 frames per second
Compatible with SD, SDHC, SDXC memory cards
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio WG-1 Adventure Series 14 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom (Black) 4GB SD HC Card Battery and More Accessory Saver Bundle
